name: Splash Them All!!
description:
Splash them all is a game about a kid in water trunks and a watergun.  Unfortunately the world is on fire and he is all alone. No adults are coming for help ='(

Help our little kiddo splash them all and save the world!

This was our first game, we really put some effort on it, hope you guys enjoy!

PS: Sorry about any english mistakes!

A game by: LeoCastanho and Mr.Solider

Art: LeoCastanho

Programming: LeoCastanho and Mr.Solider

Level Design: LeoCastanho and Mr.Solider
